articles.title: Verschoor disqualified from F2 Spa sprint for technical breach - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Richard Verschoor has been disqualified from the Formula 2 sprint at Spa after he was found to have used a throttle map which breached the technical regulations.
articles.content:
The Van Amersfoort Racing driver was found to have used a throttle map not in compliance with Article 3.6.5 of the Technical Regulations for both the formation lap and race start.
